items.title: Nifty Pharma presents sell-on-rise opportunity; your trading strategy here
items.description: The Nifty Pharma Index remains range-bound, trading between 23,450 and 22,925. A close above or below these levels would act as a directional trigger, leading to either a bullish or bearish breakout.

items.title: Nandish Shah of HDFC Securities suggests 'Bull Spread' strategy on Nifty
items.description: Short term trend of the Nifty remains bullish as it is placed above its 5, 11 and 20 day EMA.

items.title: Stock Market Today: Accenture guidance, S&P 500 record high, KRN Heat IPO
items.description: Share market today:  S&P 500 ended at a record closing high overnight, while Dow Jones and Nasdaq Composite finished with gains

items.title: Stocks To Watch: HDFC, IT stocks, Torrent Pharma, Ola Electric, Adani Green
items.description: Stocks to watch today: With Accenture raising its revenue guidance for FY25 to 3-6 per cent, exceeding its previous guidance, IT stocks in India would be in focus today.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: India markets likely to track gains in US, Asia at open; IT stocks eyed
items.description: Stock Market Today: Indian equity benchmark indices were poised for a higher open on Friday, tracking overnight gains in the US and a positive trend in Asian markets.

items.title: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO closes today: Should you invest amid 124% GMP surge?
items.description: KRN Heat Exchanger IPO has so far garnered a solid response from investors, receiving bids for 63,91,84,780 shares against 1,09,93,000 shares offered, resulting in an oversubscription of 58.14 times

items.title: UBS fears slowdown in India, US pharma markets; gives 'Sell' on 4 stocks
items.description: As per UBS, the Indian pharma market is slowing down due to a sharp increase in unbranded generics

items.title: Diffusion Engineers IPO Day 2: GMP up 54%; Should you invest or wait?
items.description: The unlisted shares of Diffusion Engineers were commanding a premium of Rs 90, which translates to a GMP of 53.57 per cent against the upper end of the IPO price of Rs 168

items.title: Multi-bagger smallcap railway stock rises 4% on order win; up 110% in 1 yr
items.description: The uptick in RailTel Corporation of India Ltd share price came after the company announced that it has bagged a work order worth Rs 156 crore from rural development department, Maharashtra.

items.title: Govt bond yields may partly reverse fall as borrowing plan disappoints
items.description: Traders will also focus on fresh debt supply, while also remaining cautious after rise in US Treasury yields

items.title: Share of this 'Z' group company hit 5% upper circuit today; here's why
items.description: Marson Ltd shares rose after the company said it has received a Letter of Intent (LoI) from Nacof Oorja worth Rs 675 crore.

items.title: India keeps markets guessing ahead of three key RBI MPC appointments
items.description: The contracts of three external members of RBI's monetary policy committee will expire on Oct 4, just days before the MPC is expected to meet and make its rate decision on Oct 9

items.title: Vedanta stock rallies 15% in one week as market cap climbs to Rs 2 trn
items.description: Vedanta will hold a board meeting on Tuesday, October 8, to consider and approve the fourth interim dividend for the financial year 2024-25.

items.title: Bondada share locks in 5% upper circuit on Rs 468-cr order from KPI Green
items.description: The surge in the Bondada share price came after the company announced that it has secured an order worth Rs 468 crore from KPI Green Energy.
